segments.text: He's awful ! He telephoned me four times yesterday , and three times the day before yesterday . He telephoned the office yesterday morning and yesterday afternoon . My boss answered the telephone .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What did your boss say to him ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: He said , Pauline is typing letters . She can't speak to you now ! " Then I arrived home at six o'clock yesterday evening . He telephoned again . But I didn ’ t answer the phone !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Did he telephone again last night ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , he did . He telephoned at nine o'clock .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What did you say to him ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I said , This is Pauline's mother . Please don ’ t telephone my daughter again !
segments.speaker: S2
